str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Knowledge, doctrine, wisdom. From ginosko; knowing, i.e. knowledge.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A custom, habit, practice. From a compound of sun and ethos; mutual habituation, i.e. Usage.
An idol, false god. From eidos; an image; by implication, a heathen god, or the worship of such.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

word: it were sacrificed to an idol.
str2: Neuter of a compound of eidolon and a presumed derivative of thuo; an image-sacrifice, i.e. Part of an idolatrous offering.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
(lit: not strong), (a) weak (physically, or morally), (b) infirm, sick. Strengthless.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To soil, stain, pollute, defile, lit. and met. Probably from melas; to soil.
